title: How can I report a player who trolled in champion selection but didn't get into game?
body:
Okay I'm not pointing the name out.
I got a notification from riot said that I should use the report system, but the reason I'm posting this is exactly I CAN'T.
This game didn't happen because someone dodged, but this player is posing a clear threat to other player's gaming experience, and need to be stopped, AND I CAN'T FIND A WAY TO INFORM THE SYSTEM

I censored that duo trolls' name, I hope this does not count as naming and shaming now
http://imgur.com/wc7f1Ty
http://imgur.com/BpqulMn
http://imgur.com/W1RLeJu

And yeah this is a ranked game.

Look I'm not trying to get these certain two players banned, although I would be glad to see it.
I'm saying that we don't have a way to wipe this kind of threat out of our community. We can't do anything about it until these guys finally did some harm. This makes me feel bad.

replies.body: There is no rule against locking in on character choice.  Nor should there be.

You are in the wrong village, this thread is not even close to about off-meta pick, they said they are going to feed clear and loud
What I mean by "they locked" is "they are serious about feeding, this is not a joke"

If you're saying it as a joke to friends in private is different than saying it as a joke in champ select or in game.  But it can be difficult to tell in text, so a lot of people will take threats to feed seriously.

And OP:  You got the names off in the chat screen shots, but you missed names under the champion portraits.  What you should do is send the unaltered pics to Riot in a support ticket.  The link it in the top right corner.  There's no "Report a player" option, but if you select "I have a queston about League" and then under category pick "Gameplay and Features" => "General" with comments on what happened and the pictures attached, it'll get forwarded to the Behavioral department.

I see nothing to report here. I say I'm going to feed all the time in champ select and then carry the game. Is saying you're going to feed reportable now? Everytime I tell my friends in private chat "I'm going to feed lol" should they report me for it?
They locked, it's not a joke

Everyone locks, eventually. And if they want a role, there's no rules stopping them from taking it.

HOWEVER, I did just realized that I derpishly missed your second chat image. Although when you censor the names, and don't show the context, it's kinda hard to tell who's saying what to who for what reasons and in response to what. But w/e, I redact my first comment. Somebody calling other players "trash" IS always a problem.
It's like you know there is a bomb, but you are not allowed to throw it away until it explodes
